name: Dark Fantasy: Jigsaw Puzzle
description:
Jigsaw puzzles have never been this atmospheric! Dark Fantasy will take you on a journey through gloomy portraits.

+ 20 different Jigsaw puzzles to complete
+ 3x4, 6x8, 9x12, 12x16, 15x20 puzzles
+ Very high replayability, it really takes hours!
+ Fantastic graphics for its genre
+ Great music
